Package com.medilabo.microlabo.service

Class PatientService

java.lang.Object
com.medilabo.microlabo.service.PatientService
@Service public class PatientService extends Object
Service class for managing patients. Provides methods to create, update, delete, and retrieve patient information.

    • getAllPatients

      public List<Patient> getAllPatients()
      Retrieves all patients.
      Returns:
      a list of all Patient

    • getPatientById

      public Patient getPatientById(long id)
      Retrieves a patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the patient to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Patient with the given ID
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if no patient is found with the given ID

    • addPatient

      @Transactional public Patient addPatient(Patient patient)
      Adds a new patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient
      Returns:
      the added Patient
      Throws:
      PatientAlreadyExistsException - if a patient with the same first name, last name, and birthdate already exists

    • updatePatient

      @Transactional public Patient updatePatient(Patient patient)
      Updates an existing patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient object containing updated information
      Returns:
      the updated Patient
      Throws:
      PatientAlreadyExistsException - if a patient with the same first name, last name, and birthdate already exists (excluding the current patient)

    • deletePatientById

      @Transactional public void deletePatientById(long id)
      Deletes a patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the patient to delete
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if no patient is found with the given ID

      public Integer getAgeById(long id)

      Returns:
      the age of the patient

      Returns:

    • getGenderById

      public String getGenderById(Long id)

      id - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      the gender of the patient

    • isSamePatient

      public boolean isSamePatient(Patient patientToAdd)
      Checks if a patient with the same first name, last name, and birthdate already exists.
      Parameters:
      patientToAdd - the Patient to check
      Returns:
      true if a patient with the same first name, last name, and birthdate exists, otherwise false

    • isSamePatientExcludingCurrent

      public boolean isSamePatientExcludingCurrent(Patient patient)
      Checks if a patient with the same first name, last name, and birthdate exists, excluding the current patient. it avoids throwing PatientAlreadyExistsException when changing the fields that have most chances of changing (phone, email, address).
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient to check
      Returns:
      true if a patient with the same first name, last name, and birthdate exists, excluding the current patient, otherwise false

    • existsPatient

      public boolean existsPatient(Long id)
      Checks if a patient exists by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      true if the patient exists, otherwise false
